name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust skill set in **Python**, **Docker**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to develop high-performance machine learning solutions. I have extensive hands-on experience in integrating **LLM** technologies, including **Langchain**, **LlamaIndex**, and **Generative AI**, into scalable applications. My proficiency in building applications with **Streamlit** and **Gradio** enables me to create user-friendly interfaces that enhance model interaction. 
I excel in implementing **CI/CD** practices and **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)**, ensuring rapid, reliable deployment and operation of AI solutions. My background in **Caching**, **Parallelism**, and **Decoupling** allows me to optimize application architecture for performance and maintainability. 
In addition to my technical skills, I possess strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities, complemented by effective communication skills that facilitate collaboration with cross-functional teams. I have successfully led projects that leverage advanced **Prompt Engineering** and **LLM Architecture** to address complex challenges in the healthcare and financial sectors.
